definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: A valuable road map for understanding and healing cybersex addictions.
sentences.chinese: 一個網絡性愛的理解和治療吸毒成癮寶貴的路線圖。

sentences.english: AS the Nomogram was made, it provided a more simple and convenient method for estimating the lean yield.
sentences.chinese: 列線圖的製作爲估算瘦肉量提供了更簡便的方法。

sentences.english: He lined out the route for the sightseers.
sentences.chinese: 他給遊客們畫出了路線圖。

sentences.english: What's the future road map of Tasktop product?
sentences.chinese: Tasktop產品未來的路線圖如何？

sentences.english: So, here I have a contour plot of a function, and I have a blue vector.
sentences.chinese: 我這裏有一個函數的等值線圖，還有一個藍色的向量。

sentences.english: It was time for us to evaluate our roadmap against the technology we were using.
sentences.chinese: 現在是時候對我們使用的技術路線圖作一個評估了。

sentences.english: That's why the contours are evenly spaced.
sentences.chinese: 那就是爲什麼等高線圖是均勻間隔線的排列的。

sentences.english: It can plot diversified Isoline Figure and 3-D solid figure.
sentences.chinese: 可以繪製各種等值線圖和三維立體圖。

sentences.english: We draw them parallel to the moving average in the intermediate timeframe, usually daily.
sentences.chinese: 在中週期，通常是日線圖，平行於均線畫通道。

sentences.english: He replied to Hogan and sent him a plot of the noise.
sentences.chinese: 他回信給霍根並寄去一段噪音的曲線圖。

sentences.english: What is the future road map of ROO project in terms of new features?
sentences.chinese: 在新特性方面，ROO項目未來的路線圖是怎樣的？

sentences.english: There are many different forms these roadmaps might take.
sentences.chinese: 這些路線圖可以有各種不同的形式。

sentences.english: Vellum paper with a glazed surface is used for decorative documents.
sentences.chinese: 是厚的描圖紙，尤其方便用在針筆線圖上。

sentences.english: Moral behavior, however, is scattered all over the chart.
sentences.chinese: 但是道德行爲卻分散在曲線圖的每個角落。

sentences.english: The box-and-line diagram of the architecture leaves a lot of room for interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 體系結構的框線圖留下了大量有待解釋的空間。

sentences.english: Coté adds that roadmaps should be publicly available.
sentences.chinese: 古德補充道，路線圖也應該是公開的。

definition: Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
